title: Delft University of Technology
subtitle: Teaching Assistant
paragraph: Recently I have started my position as a Teaching Assistant (TA) in Web and Database Technology course. As a TA, my role is to help students grasp concepts they find difficult during the lab sessions. The topics covered in the course include: introduction to databases, database design, (non-)relational database systems, SQL, web front-end and back-end development, HTML, CSS, JS, Node.js.
